scripts.preinstall: if [ "$CI" != true ]; then cat Brewfile; echo; read -p "Install Brewfile dependencies as shown above (y/N)?" -n 1 -r; echo; if [ "$REPLY" == "y" ]; then brew bundle check || brew bundle install; fi; fi
scripts.postinstall: if [ "$CI" != true ]; then pre-commit install --install-hooks --overwrite; fi
scripts.detect-secrets: git ls-files -z | xargs -0 detect-secrets-hook --baseline .secrets.baseline # pragma: allowlist-secret
scripts.build:app: cd projects/app && rm -rf dist && cp -r ./ dist && find dist -type f ! -name '*.njk' -print0 | xargs -0 rm -f && cp -r ./static dist && rolldown -c rolldown.config.ts && cd dist && cp ../../../package.json ./package.json
scripts.run:app: npm run watch:app & cd projects/app && sam local start-api --warm-containers LAZY
scripts.generate-openapi:app: npm run build:app && fastify generate-swagger projects/app/dist/app.js > projects/app/openapi.json
